meanings.sent1: She had the lippiest smile in the room.
meanings.sent2: The actress with the lippiest pout won the beauty contest.
meanings.sent3: The cartoon character had the lippiest lips, making everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The rose petals were the lippiest shade of red, like a painting come to life.
meanings.sent5: The lippiest lipstick color made her stand out in the crowd.

meanings.definition: Showing a tendency to talk back or argue.
meanings.sent1: He was the lippiest student in the class, always questioning the teacher.
meanings.sent2: The toddler became the lippiest when told it was bedtime.
meanings.sent3: The parrot was the lippiest bird in the pet store, mimicking everything said.
meanings.sent4: The courtroom was filled with the lippiest lawyers, each trying to out-argue the other.
meanings.sent5: The lippiest debate team member never shied away from a challenge.
